player.flags

jumping:
1 > 3 > 5

hammering:
0x00200000 > 0x01200000 > 0x00200000

opening partner/item menu, pausing:
0x00002020

hitting save block:
0x00002000

spinning:
0x10020000

hidden with bow:
0x00002100 > 0x0000A100 (approaching) > 0x1000A100 (mario hands up) > 0x1000A001 (final)

riding laki:
0x00002100 > 0x00003100 (mario jumping) > 0x10003000 (final)

going through door:
0x00002000 > 0x00003000 > 0x04007000 (while walking) > 0x04003000 (almost faded out) > 0x04002000 (faded out) >
0x80000000 (black) > 0x80002000 > 0x00002000 > 0x40002000 > 0x00002000 >
0x00006000 (fading in) > 0x00002000 (door closing) >

0x00000001 =
0x00000002 = jump ascending
0x00000004 = jump descending
0x00000008
0x00000010
0x00000020
0x00000040
0x00000080
0x00000100
0x00000200
0x00000400
0x00000800
0x00001000
0x00002000 = mario can't move
0x00004000
0x00008000
0x00010000
0x00020000
0x00040000
0x00080000
0x00100000
0x00200000
0x00400000
0x00800000
0x01000000
0x02000000 = can talk to npc
0x04000000
0x08000000
0x10000000 = mario holding item? but also when talking...
0x20000000
0x40000000
0x80000000 = possibly something with the camera?
